## ThirdwebSDK.getNFTDrop() method

Get an instance of a Drop contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNFTDrop(contractAddress: string): NFTDrop;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contractAddress | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

NFTDrop

the contract
